casebody.data:
John S. KAMINSKI
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018 John S. Kaminski, self-represented, in support of the petition.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.

The petitioner John S. Kaminski's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 181 Conn. App. 903 , 183 A.3d 1239 (2018), is denied.
